Package arcade.patch.env.operation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PatchOperation
    Abstract implementation of Operation for PatchLattice environments.
    PatchOperationDiffuser
    Extension of PatchOperation for diffusion.
    PatchOperationDiffuserRect
    Extension of PatchOperationDiffuser for rectangular lattices.
    PatchOperationDiffuserTri
    Extension of PatchOperationDiffuser for triangular lattices.
    PatchOperationGenerator
    Extension of PatchOperation for generation.
